オプション1: Star Man arrived at the Ubuntu Cave.
(If the monsters rely on sunlight, then the cave should be safe.)
The cave resembled an old mine. There were no monsters, but several ghosts lingered.

(If I remember right, those things can only be taken down with black flame.
But with my current strength, I don’t stand a chance.
Better to leave it for now.)
Star Man decided to turn back.

On his way back, Star Man found a stone mottled with orange and green.
He picked up the strange stone, left the cave, and headed toward the ruins.
